,RawBlock "latex" "\n\\begin{code}\nclass Kleisli m where\n    idK  :: a -> m a\n    (*>) :: (a -> m b) -> (b -> m c) -> (a -> m c)    \n\\end{code}\n"
,Para [Str "\1069\1090\1086\1090",Space,Str "\1082\1083\1072\1089\1089",Space,Str "\1103\1074\1083\1103\1077\1090\1089\1103",Space,Str "\1082\1083\1072\1089\1089\1086\1084",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{Category}",Space,Str "\1074",Space,Str "\1084\1080\1088\1077",Space,Str "\1085\1072\1096\1080\1093",Space,Str "\1089\1087\1077\1094\1080\1072\1083\1100\1085\1099\1093",Space,Str "\1092\1091\1085\1082\1094\1080\1081",Str ".",Space,Str "\1045\1089\1083\1080",Space,Str "\1084\1099",Space,Str "\1089\1086\1090\1088\1105\1084",Space,Str "\1074\1089\1077",Space,Str "\1073\1091\1082\1074\1099",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{m}",Str ",",Space,Str "\1090\1086",Space,Str "\1084\1099",Space,Str "\1087\1086\1083\1091\1095\1080\1084",Space,Str "\1086\1073\1099\1095\1085\1099\1077",Space,Str "\1090\1080\1087\1099",Space,Str "\1076\1083\1103",Space,Str "\1090\1086\1078\1076\1077\1089\1090\1074\1072",Space,Str "\1080",Space,Str "\1082\1086\1084\1087\1086\1079\1080\1094\1080\1080",Str ".",Space,Str "\1042",Space,Str "\1101\1090\1086\1084",Space,Str "\1084\1080\1088\1077",Space,Str "\1076\1086\1083\1078\1085\1099",Space,Str "\1074\1099\1087\1086\1083\1085\1103\1090\1100\1089\1103",Space,Str "\1090\1077",Space,Str "\1078\1077",Space,Str "\1087\1088\1072\1074\1080\1083\1072",Str ":"]
,RawBlock "latex" "\n\\begin{code}\nf   *> idK  == f\nidK *> f    == f\n\nf *> (g *> h) == (f *> g) *> h\n\\end{code}\n"

,Header 3 [Str "\1054\1073\1086\1073\1097\1105\1085\1085\1072\1103",Space,Str "\1092\1086\1088\1084\1091\1083\1080\1088\1086\1074\1082\1072",Space,Str "\1082\1072\1090\1077\1075\1086\1088\1080\1080",Space,Str "\1050\1083\1077\1081\1089\1083\1080"]
,Para [Str "\1054\1090\1084\1077\1090\1080\1084",Str ",",Space,Str "\1095\1090\1086",Space,Str "\1084\1099",Space,Str "\1084\1086\1075\1083\1080",Space,Str "\1073\1099",Space,Str "\1089\1092\1086\1088\1084\1091\1083\1080\1088\1086\1074\1072\1090\1100",Space,Str "\1082\1083\1072\1089\1089",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{Kleisli}",Space,Str "\1080",Space,Str "\1074",Space,Str "\1073\1086\1083\1077\1077",Space,Str "\1086\1073\1097\1077\1084",Space,Str "\1074\1080\1076\1077",Space,Str "\1089",Space,Str "\1087\1086\1084\1086\1097\1100\1102",Space,Str "\1082\1083\1072\1089\1089\1072",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{Category}",Str ":"]
,RawBlock "latex" "\n\\begin{code}\nclass Kleisli m where\n    idK  :: Category cat => cat a (m a)\n    (*>) :: Category cat => cat a (m b) -> cat b (m c) -> cat a (m c)\n\n(+>) :: (Category cat, Kleisli m) \n    => cat a (m b) -> cat b c -> cat a (m c)\nf +> g = f *> (g >> idK)\n\\end{code}\n"
,Para [Str "\1052\1099",Space,Str "\1079\1072\1084\1077\1085\1080\1083\1080",Space,Str "\1092\1091\1085\1082\1094\1080\1086\1085\1072\1083\1100\1085\1099\1081",Space,Str "\1090\1080\1087",Space,Str "\1085\1072",Space,Str "\1077\1075\1086",Space,Str "\1086\1073\1086\1073\1097\1077\1085\1080\1077",Str ".",Space,Str "\1044\1083\1103",Space,Str "\1085\1072\1075\1083\1103\1076\1085\1086\1089\1090\1080",Space,Str "\1084\1099",Space,Str "\1073\1091\1076\1077\1084",Space,Str "\1087\1086\1083\1100\1079\1086\1074\1072\1090\1100\1089\1103",Space,Str "\1089\1087\1077\1094\1080\1072\1083\1100\1085\1086\1081",Space,Str "\1092\1086\1088\1084\1091\1083\1080\1088\1086\1074\1082\1086\1081",Space,Str "\1089\1086",Space,Str "\1089\1090\1088\1077\1083\1086\1095\1085\1099\1084",Space,Str "\1090\1080\1087\1086\1084",Str "."]
,Para [Str "\1044\1083\1103",Space,Str "\1101\1090\1086\1075\1086",Space,Str "\1084\1099",Space,Str "\1086\1087\1088\1077\1076\1077\1083\1080\1084",Space,Str "\1084\1086\1076\1091\1083\1100",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{Kleisli.hs}"]
,RawBlock "latex" "\n\\begin{code}\nmodule Kleisli where\n\nimport Prelude hiding (id, (>>))\n\nclass Category cat where\n    id   :: cat a a\n    (>>) :: cat a b -> cat b c -> cat a c\n\nclass Kleisli m where\n    idK  :: a -> m a\n    (*>) :: (a -> m b) -> (b -> m c) -> (a -> m c)    \n\n(+>) :: Kleisli m => (a -> m b) -> (b -> c) -> (a -> m c)\nf +> g = f *> (g >> idK)\n\n-- \1069\1082\1079\1077\1084\1087\1083\1103\1088 \1076\1083\1103 \1092\1091\1085\1082\1094\1080\1081\n\ninstance Category (->) where\n    id      = \\x -> x\n    f >> g  = \\x -> g (f x)\n\\end{code}\n"
,Para [Str "\1052\1099",Space,Str "\1085\1077",Space,Str "\1073\1091\1076\1077\1084",Space,Str "\1080\1084\1087\1086\1088\1090\1080\1088\1086\1074\1072\1090\1100",Space,Str "\1092\1091\1085\1082\1094\1080\1102",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{id}",Str ",",Space,Str "\1072",Space,Str "\1086\1087\1088\1077\1076\1077\1083\1080\1084",Space,Str "\1077\1105",Space,Str "\1074",Space,Str "\1082\1083\1072\1089\1089\1077",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{Category}",Str ".",Space,Str "\1058\1072\1082\1078\1077",Space,Str "\1074",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{Prelude}",Space,Str "\1091\1078\1077",Space,Str "\1086\1087\1088\1077\1076\1077\1083\1077\1085\1072",Space,Str "\1092\1091\1085\1082\1094\1080\1103",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{(>>)}",Space,Str "\1084\1099",Space,Str "\1089\1087\1088\1103\1095\1077\1084",Space,Str "\1077\1105",Space,Str "\1089",Space,Str "\1087\1086\1084\1086\1097\1100\1102",Space,Str "\1089\1087\1077\1094\1080\1072\1083\1100\1085\1086\1081",Space,Str "\1076\1080\1088\1077\1082\1090\1080\1074\1099",Space,RawInline "tex" "\\KeyWord{hiding}",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{hiding}",Space,Str "\1076\1083\1103",Space,Str "\1090\1086\1075\1086",Str ",",Space,Str "\1095\1090\1086\1073\1099",Space,Str "\1086\1085\1072",Space,Str "\1085\1072\1084",Space,Str "\1085\1077",Space,Str "\1084\1077\1096\1072\1083\1072\1089\1100",Str ".",Space,Str "\1044\1072\1083\1077\1077",Space,Str "\1084\1099",Space,Str "\1073\1091\1076\1077\1084",Space,Str "\1076\1086\1087\1086\1083\1085\1103\1090\1100",Space,Str "\1101\1090\1086\1090",Space,Str "\1084\1086\1076\1091\1083\1100",Space,Str "\1101\1082\1079\1077\1084\1087\1083\1103\1088\1072\1084\1080",Space,Str "\1082\1083\1072\1089\1089\1072",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{Kleisli}",Space,Str "\1080",Space,Str "\1087\1088\1080\1084\1077\1088\1072\1084\1080",Str "."]

,Header 3 [Str "\1063\1072\1089\1090\1080\1095\1085\1086",Space,Str "\1086\1087\1088\1077\1076\1077\1083\1105\1085\1085\1099\1077",Space,Str "\1092\1091\1085\1082\1094\1080\1080"]

,RawBlock "latex" "\n\\begin{code}\ndata Maybe a = Nothing | Just a\n    deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)\n\\end{code}\n"

,RawBlock "latex" "\n\\begin{code}\ninstance Kleisli Maybe where\n    idK    = Just\n    f *> g = \\a -> case f a of\n                        Nothing -> Nothing\n                        Just b  -> g b\n\\end{code}\n"
,Para [Str "\1057\1084\1086\1090\1088\1080\1090\1077",Str ",",Space,Str "\1074",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{case}",Str "-",Str "\1074\1099\1088\1072\1078\1077\1085\1080\1080",Space,Str "\1084\1099",Space,Str "\1074\1086\1079\1074\1088\1072\1097\1072\1077\1084",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{Nothing}",Str ",",Space,Str "\1077\1089\1083\1080",Space,Str "\1092\1091\1085\1082\1094\1080\1103",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{f}",Space,Str "\1074\1077\1088\1085\1091\1083\1072",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{Nothing}",Str ",",Space,Str "\1072",Space,Str "\1077\1089\1083\1080",Space,Str "\1077\1081",Space,Str "\1091\1076\1072\1083\1086\1089\1100",Space,Str "\1074\1099\1095\1080\1089\1083\1080\1090\1100",Space,Str "\1079\1085\1072\1095\1077\1085\1080\1077",Space,Str "\1080",Space,Str "\1086\1085\1072",Space,Str "\1074\1077\1088\1085\1091\1083\1072",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{(Just b)}",Space,Str "\1084\1099",Space,Str "\1087\1077\1088\1077\1076\1072\1105\1084",Space,Str "\1101\1090\1086",Space,Str "\1079\1085\1072\1095\1077\1085\1080\1077",Space,Str "\1074",Space,Str "\1089\1083\1077\1076\1091\1102\1097\1091\1102",Space,Str "\1092\1091\1085\1082\1094\1080\1102",Str ",",Space,Str "\1090",Str ".",Str "\1077",Str ".",Str "~",Str "\1089\1086\1089\1090\1072\1074\1083\1103\1077\1084",Space,Str "\1074\1099\1088\1072\1078\1077\1085\1080\1077",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{(g b)}",Str "."]

,RawBlock "latex" "\n\\begin{code}\nmodule Kleisli where\n    \nimport Prelude hiding(id, (>>), pred)\nimport Nat\n\\end{code}\n"
,Para [Str "\1044\1086\1073\1072\1074\1080\1084",Space,Str "\1086\1087\1088\1077\1076\1077\1083\1077\1085\1080\1077",Space,Str "\1101\1082\1079\1077\1084\1087\1083\1103\1088\1072",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{Kleisli}",Space,Str "\1076\1083\1103",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{Maybe}",Space,Str "\1074",Space,Str "\1084\1086\1076\1091\1083\1100",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{Kleisli}",Space,Str "\1072",Space,Str "\1090\1072\1082\1078\1077",Space,Str "\1086\1087\1088\1077\1076\1077\1083\1077\1085\1080\1077",Space,Str "\1092\1091\1085\1082\1094\1080\1080",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{pred}",Str ".",Space,Str "\1057\1086\1093\1088\1072\1085\1080\1084",Space,Str "\1086\1073\1085\1086\1074\1083\1105\1085\1085\1099\1081",Space,Str "\1084\1086\1076\1091\1083\1100",Space,Str "\1080",Space,Str "\1079\1072\1075\1088\1091\1079\1080\1084",Space,Str "\1074",Space,Str "\1080\1085\1090\1077\1088\1087\1088\1077\1090\1072\1090\1086\1088",Str "."]

,RawBlock "latex" "\n\\begin{code}\nmaybe              :: b -> (a -> b) -> Maybe a -> b\nmaybe n f Nothing  =  n\nmaybe n f (Just x) =  f x\n\\end{code}\n"

,Para [Str "\1055\1086\1089\1082\1086\1083\1100\1082\1091",Space,Str "\1092\1091\1085\1082\1094\1080\1103",Space,Str "\1076\1074\1091\1093",Space,Str "\1072\1088\1075\1091\1084\1077\1085\1090\1086\1074",Space,Str "\1085\1072",Space,Str "\1089\1072\1084\1086\1084",Space,Str "\1076\1077\1083\1077",Space,Str "\1103\1074\1083\1103\1077\1090\1089\1103",Space,Str "\1092\1091\1085\1082\1094\1080\1077\1081",Space,Str "\1086\1076\1085\1086\1075\1086",Space,Str "\1072\1088\1075\1091\1084\1077\1085\1090\1072",Space,Str "\1084\1099",Space,Str "\1084\1086\1078\1077\1084",Space,Str "\1087\1088\1080\1084\1077\1085\1080\1090\1100",Space,Str "\1087\1077\1088\1074\1099\1081",Space,Str "\1072\1088\1075\1091\1084\1077\1085\1090",Space,Str "\1089",Space,Str "\1087\1086\1084\1086\1097\1100\1102",Space,Str "\1092\1091\1085\1082\1094\1080\1080",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{lift1}",Str ",",Space,Str "\1087\1086\1089\1084\1086\1090\1088\1080\1084",Space,Str "\1095\1090\1086",Space,Str "\1091",Space,Str "\1085\1072\1089",Space,Str "\1087\1086\1083\1091\1095\1080\1090\1089\1103",Str ":"]
,RawBlock "latex" "\n\\begin{code}\nlift1       :: (a' -> b') -> m' a' -> m' b'\nf           :: (a -> b -> c)\na           :: m a\n\nlift1 f a   :: m (b -> c)  -- m' == m, a' == a, b' == b -> c\n\\end{code}\n"
,Para [Str "\1058\1077\1087\1077\1088\1100",Space,Str "\1074",Space,Str "\1085\1072\1096\1077\1084",Space,Str "\1086\1087\1088\1077\1076\1077\1083\1077\1085\1080\1080",Space,Str "\1076\1083\1103",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{lift2}",Space,Str "\1087\1086\1103\1074\1080\1090\1089\1103",Space,Str "\1085\1086\1074\1086\1077",Space,Str "\1089\1083\1072\1075\1072\1077\1084\1086\1077",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{g}",Str ":"]
,RawBlock "latex" "\n\\begin{code}\nlift2 :: Kleisli m => (a -> b -> c) -> m a -> m b -> m c\nlift2 f a b = ...\n    where g = lift1 f a\n\\end{code}\n"
,Para [Str "\1054\1076\1080\1085",Space,Str "\1072\1088\1075\1091\1084\1077\1085\1090",Space,Str "\1084\1099",Space,Str "\1087\1088\1080\1084\1077\1085\1080\1083\1080",Str ",",Space,Str "\1086\1089\1090\1072\1083\1086\1089\1100",Space,Str "\1087\1088\1080\1084\1077\1085\1080\1090\1100",Space,Str "\1074\1090\1086\1088\1086\1081",Str ".",Space,Str "\1053\1072\1084",Space,Str "\1085\1091\1078\1085\1086",Space,Str "\1089\1086\1089\1090\1072\1074\1080\1090\1100",Space,Str "\1074\1099\1088\1072\1078\1077\1085\1080\1077",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{(g b)}",Str ",",Space,Str "\1085\1086",Space,Str "\1076\1083\1103",Space,Str "\1101\1090\1086\1075\1086",Space,Str "\1085\1072\1084",Space,Str "\1085\1091\1078\1085\1072",Space,Str "\1092\1091\1085\1082\1094\1080\1103",Space,Str "\1090\1080\1087\1072",Str ":"]
,RawBlock "latex" "\n\\begin{code}\nm (b -> c) -> m b -> m c\n\\end{code}\n"

,RawBlock "latex" "\n\\begin{code}\nmapK :: Kleisli m => (a -> m b) -> [a] -> m [b]\nmapK f = sequence . map f\n\\end{code}\n"

,Para [Str "\1048\1093",Space,Str "\1090\1080\1087\1072",Space,Str "\1074\1080\1076\1085\1086",Str ",",Space,Str "\1095\1090\1086",Space,Str "\1101\1090\1086",Space,Str "\1085\1080",Space,Str "\1095\1090\1086",Space,Str "\1080\1085\1086\1077",Space,Str "\1082\1072\1082",Space,Str "\1092\1091\1085\1082\1094\1080\1103",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{idK}",Str ".",Space,Str "\1042",Space,Str "\1082\1083\1072\1089\1089\1077",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{Monad}",Space,Str "\1091",Space,Str "\1085\1077\1105",Space,Str "\1090\1086\1095\1085\1086",Space,Str "\1090\1072\1082\1086\1081",Space,Str "\1078\1077",Space,Str "\1089\1084\1099\1089\1083",Str ".",Space,Str "\1058\1077\1087\1077\1088\1100",Space,Str "\1092\1091\1085\1082\1094\1080\1103",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{>>=}",Str ",",Space,Str "\1086\1085\1072",Space,Str "\1095\1080\1090\1072\1077\1090\1089\1103",Space,Str "\1082\1072\1082",Space,Str "\1092\1091\1085\1082\1094\1080\1103",Space,Emph [Str "\1089\1074\1103\1079\1099\1074\1072\1085\1080\1103"],Space,Str "(",Str "bind",Str ")",Str "."]
,RawBlock "latex" "\n\\begin{code}\n(>>=)  :: m a -> (a -> m b) -> m b\n\\end{code}\n"

,Para [Str "\1057\1083\1077\1074\1072",Space,Str "\1074",Space,Str "\1089\1074\1086\1081\1089\1090\1074\1077",Space,Str "\1089\1090\1086\1080\1090",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{liftA3}",Str ",",Space,Str "\1072",Space,Str "\1085\1077",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{liftA2}",Str ",",Space,Str "\1087\1086\1090\1086\1084\1091",Space,Str "\1095\1090\1086",Space,Str "\1084\1099",Space,Str "\1089\1085\1072\1095\1072\1083\1072",Space,Str "\1087\1088\1080\1084\1077\1085\1103\1077\1084",Space,Str "\1082\1086\1084\1087\1086\1079\1080\1094\1080\1102",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{(.)}",Space,Str "\1082",Space,Str "\1076\1074\1091\1084",Space,Str "\1092\1091\1085\1082\1094\1080\1103\1084",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{f}",Space,Str "\1080",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{g}",Str ",",Space,Str "\1072",Space,Str "\1079\1072\1090\1077\1084",Space,Str "\1087\1088\1080\1084\1077\1085\1103\1077\1084",Space,Str "\1089\1086\1089\1090\1072\1074\1085\1091\1102",Space,Str "\1092\1091\1085\1082\1094\1080\1102",Space,Str "\1082",Space,Str "\1079\1085\1072\1095\1077\1085\1080\1102",Space,RawInline "latex" "\\In{x}",Str "."]

,RawBlock "latex" "\n\\begin{code}\nclass Functor f => Applicative f where\n        -- | \1055\1086\1076\1085\1080\1084\1072\1077\1084 \1079\1085\1072\1095\1077\1085\1080\1077 \1074 \1084\1080\1088 \1089\1087\1077\1094\1080\1072\1083\1100\1085\1099\1093 \1079\1085\1072\1095\1077\1085\1080\1081.\n        pure :: a -> f a\n\n        -- | \1055\1088\1080\1084\1077\1085\1077\1085\1080\1077 \1089\1087\1077\1094\1080\1072\1083\1100\1085\1086\1075\1086 \1079\1085\1072\1095\1077\1085\1080\1103-\1092\1091\1085\1082\1094\1080\1080.\n        (<*>) :: f (a -> b) -> f a -> f b\n\n        -- | \1050\1086\1085\1089\1090\1072\1085\1090\1085\1072\1103 \1092\1091\1085\1082\1094\1080\1103. \1054\1090\1073\1088\1072\1089\1099\1074\1072\1077\1084 \1087\1077\1088\1074\1086\1077 \1079\1085\1072\1095\1077\1085\1080\1077.\n        (*>) :: f a -> f b -> f b\n        (*>) = liftA2 (const id)\n        \n        -- | \1050\1086\1085\1089\1090\1072\1085\1090\1085\1072\1103 \1092\1091\1085\1082\1094\1080\1103, \1054\1090\1073\1088\1072\1089\1099\1074\1072\1077\1084 \1074\1090\1086\1088\1086\1077 \1079\1085\1072\1095\1077\1085\1080\1077.\n        (<*) :: f a -> f b -> f a\n        (<*) = liftA2 const\n\\end{code}\n"

,RawBlock "latex" "\n\\begin{code}\nclass  Monad m  where\n    return  :: a -> m a\n    (>>=)   :: m a -> (a -> m b) -> m b\n    \n    (>>)    :: m a -> m b -> m b\n    fail    :: String -> m a\n\n    m >> k  = m >>= const k\n    fail s  = error s\n\\end{code}\n"

,Para [Str "\1042",Space,Str "Haskell",Space,Str "\1087\1086\1096\1083\1080",Space,Str "\1076\1072\1083\1100\1096\1077",Space,Str "\1080",Space,Str "\1074\1099\1076\1077\1083\1080\1083\1080",Space,Str "\1076\1083\1103",Space,Str "\1090\1072\1082\1080\1093",Space,Str "\1092\1091\1085\1082\1094\1080\1081",Space,Str "\1089\1087\1077\1094\1080\1072\1083\1100\1085\1099\1081",Space,Str "\1090\1080\1087",Str ":"]
